title: [A Broken Crimson Schooner]
description: The corpses of ninjas litter the deck of the schooner, their blood long ago staining the wood.  Tattered sails flap eerily with the cold ocean breeze, the only sound being that of the sloshing waves below.  A blood-stained ship's wheel lies broken in half, one side reading, "The Marshal of Marstreforn."  A makeshift ladder leads up to a massive black ship while a stained gangplank leads down to a sandy shore.
